page.title: 02NESTON RECREATION CENTRE
page.content: A class of{35}children from Parkgate School asked their{parents}to answer a {leisure survey.}They discovered that {Neston Recreation Centre}is used regularly by 15, occasionally 15 and never 5. It is used more than once a week by 11, once a week by 7, once a month by 11 and less than once a month by 1. At the centre{20}follow their own sport{(half of them are swimmers)}and 14 follow run courses. There are 14 people who belong to another sport or an art's club. { Varied comments}were made about the centre. It was voted excellent by 1, very good 8, good 10, quite good 4, all right 5 and not very good 2. {26 people}think Neston Recreation Centre{could be improved}with a{larger {pool, more spectator space}and a {bigger car park.
